name: Baller O' Points
description:
Another awesome short game by your host Mideons! 

Premise: Your a ball, collect the rectangles around the level and avoid the rectangles that make you lose points. Challenge your friends also for the best score within 30 seconds of play time, and play multiple times to try and get the best score you can! 

Just another concept, I am making lots of work in Unity though for sure, and scripting is becoming somewhat of a breeze, and I am very proud of it. Thinking of watching some first person type tutorials next, and I am currently in the process of learning to model weapons and using Blender ( Also general art projects and such ) so cooler projects will come in time.

As for a devlog for any future titles, I am thinking of one, but I will be currently going on deployment soon in the Navy, so making dev logs won't  be easy to always do all the time. If I do make one and go on deployment right after, what I can do is basically create a devlog that has 6 months of work, and on one complete devlog for a game, ill bold the words  to label a week. If this doesn't make sense now, I wouldn't worry about it, until you see the product itself, but its an idea.  

Same as every other title, don't expect any future updates on this, and if I do, expect them to come slowly or just a random bug fix here or there but Ill throw out a "future idea" list, as a just in case I want to come back here for inspiration or an update.

Ideas:

Add Random Level Selector.

Add an Ability to let players create their own timers. 

Add an ability to make the "I do something" button turn from making a block red to making cubes fall from the sky ( could of done it here but didn't feel for it ).
